item.description:
Here's an opportunity to see the SENNA movie at last!

Thanks a LOT to our newest member Gregory Scott who brought this to my attention.

Get your tickets soon at http://starlight.org/newengland/sennatickets/  According to Gregory, there are only about 140 seats in that theater, so get it quick!

General Admission is $15 and Reserved seats are $35

Watch the trailer here - http://www.workingtitlefilms.co.uk/features/video/id/208/international-trailer - that itself is awesome :-)

The movie is at 8pm, we'll meet just inside the entrance at 7:30pm.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet just inside the Entrance
item.name: SENNA - The Movie!!!
